General.Name: CardioComm Solutions Inc.
General.Description: CardioComm Solutions, Inc. engages in the development of advanced software and hardware products, and core laboratory reading services related to electrocardiogram (ECG) and ambulatory arrhythmia monitoring systems for medical and consumer markets worldwide. The company is also involved in the sale of ECG recording equipment. CardioComm Solutions, Inc. was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 18 Wynford Drive, Toronto, ON, Canada, M3C 3S2
